Description: Connections with and impact on local community
Gaps between governance ideals and practice
Reliance on grants, subsidies, or single funding sources
Tension between social mission and commercial pressures
Degree of agency and self-determination for participants
Legal and regulatory challenges faced by WISEs
Portability of skills to open labour market
Practices promoting inclusion of marginalised groups
Conflicts or trade-offs between stakeholder groups
Training, mentoring, and career progression support
